title: Jesus Comes With All His Glory

verses.text:
Jesus comes with all his glory,
To the earth he once forsook;
All who pierced him shall behold him,
Amid flames of holy fire.

Jesus comes—for him we're waiting,
Waiting for his glorious day;
No longer like a lamb for slaughter,
He will come in bright array.

Jesus comes—the dead in Christ shall
First from death's dark prison rise;
Then the living saints, ascending,
Meet the Lord above the skies.

Jesus comes—O blessed vision!
Sweetest thought to faith and love!
Billows of eternal glory
Roll between us and above.
